hooks.command: echo 'Hook triggered for file modification' && if git diff --name-only 2>/dev/null | grep -E '\.(js|ts|py|java|rb|go|php|c|cpp|cs|rs|swift|kt|scala|clj|ex|erl|pl|r|m|h)$' >/dev/null 2>&1; then echo 'Code files detected, updating AI docs...' && claude -p 'Run /update-ai-docs' || echo 'Failed to update docs'; else echo 'No code files modified'; fi
